#
# .chatfilter.txt
# This file stores the macro templates for the chat filter module. Do not edit this file.
#

# Filter for config []
Filter[].Script=IF(@querymodreqlist);<BR />    IFMATCHES(%CHATCLEAN%,^---- \d Mod Requests ----);<BR />        FILTER();<BR />    ENDIF;<BR />    IFMATCHES(%CHATCLEAN%,^\d+\.(?: \[\d+\])?(?: \[\w+\])? \[\w+\]);<BR /><BR />        MATCH(%CHATCLEAN%,^(\d+)\.,&linereqnumber,1);<BR />        @&selectreqnumber[] = %&linereqnumber%;<BR /><BR />        MATCH(%CHATCLEAN%,^\d+\.(?: \[\d+\])?(?: \[\w+\])? \[\w+\] (\w+\.\d{1\,2}@\d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2}),&linereqdate,1);<BR />        @&selectreqdate[] = %&linereqdate%;<BR /><BR />        MATCH(%CHATCLEAN%,^\d+\.(?: \[\d+\])?(?: \[\w+\])? \[(\w+)\],&linereqstatus,1);<BR />        @&selectreqstatus[] = %&linereqstatus%;<BR /><BR />        MATCH(%CHATCLEAN%,^\d+\.(?: \[\d+\])?(?: \[\w+\])? \[\w+\] \w+\.\d{1\,2}@\d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2} (\w+) -,&linereqplayer,1);<BR />        @&selectreqrequester[] = %&linereqplayer%;<BR /><BR />        MATCH(%CHATCLEAN%,^\d+\.(?: \[\d+\])?(?: \[\w+\])? \[\w+\] \w+\.\d{1\,2}@\d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2} \w+ - (.+),&linereqtext,1);<BR />        @&selectreqrequesttext[] = %&linereqtext%;<BR /><BR />        ARRAYSIZE(@&selectreqnumber[],#selectreqarraysize);<BR />        DEC(#selectreqarraysize);<BR />        SETPROPERTY(SelectReqLblNumber%#selectreqarraysize%,visible,1);<BR />        SETPROPERTY(SelectReqLblRequestText%#selectreqarraysize%,visible,1);<BR />        SETPROPERTY(SelectReqBtnSelect%#selectreqarraysize%,visible,1);<BR />        SETPROPERTY(SelectReqBtnClaimTP%#selectreqarraysize%,visible,1);<BR />        SETPROPERTY(SelectReqBtnTeleport%#selectreqarraysize%,visible,1);<BR />        SETPROPERTY(SelectReqBtnElevate%#selectreqarraysize%,visible,1);<BR />        SETPROPERTY(SelectReqLblDate%#selectreqarraysize%,visible,1);<BR />        SETPROPERTY(SelectReqLblStatus%#selectreqarraysize%,visible,1);<BR />        SETPROPERTY(SelectReqLblRequester%#selectreqarraysize%,visible,1);<BR /><BR />        FILTER();<BR />    ENDIF;<BR />    IFMATCHES(%CHATCLEAN%,^---- Page \d of \d ----);<BR />        IFMATCHES(%CHATCLEAN%,^---- Page 1 of 2 ----);<BR />            IF(@queryadminreqlist);<BR />                ECHO("/check -a p:2");<BR />                UNSET(@queryadminreqlist);<BR />            ELSE;<BR />                ECHO("/check p:2");<BR />            ENDIF;<BR />        ENDIF;<BR />        FILTER();<BR />    ENDIF;<BR />    IFMATCHES(%CHATCLEAN%,^There are currently no open mod requests.);<BR />        FILTER();<BR />    ENDIF;<BR />ENDIF;<BR />IF(@querycheckmodreq);<BR />    IF(@querymodreqtextline);<BR />        MATCH(%CHATCLEAN%,^(.+),&selectedmodreqtextmatch,1);<BR />        IFMATCHES(%&selectedmodreqtextmatch%,^(.{65}));<BR />            MATCH(%&selectedmodreqtextmatch%,^(.{60}),&selectedmodreqtextmatch1,1);<BR />            MATCH(%&selectedmodreqtextmatch%,^.{60}(.+),&selectedmodreqtextmatch2,1);<BR />            @&selectedmodreqtext = "%&selectedmodreqtextmatch1%\n %&selectedmodreqtextmatch2%";<BR />        ELSE;<BR />            @&selectedmodreqtext = %&selectedmodreqtextmatch%;<BR />        ENDIF;<BR />        UNSET(@querymodreqtextline);<BR />        FILTER();<BR />    ENDIF;<BR />    IFMATCHES(%CHATCLEAN%,^Filed by \w+ at \w+\.\d{1\,2}@\d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2} at \w+\, (?:-)?\d{1\,4}, (?:-)?\d{1\,4}, (?:-)?\d{1\,4});<BR />        MATCH(%CHATCLEAN%,^Filed by (\w+) ,@&selectedmodreqplayername,1);<BR />        MATCH(%CHATCLEAN%,^Filed by \w+ at (\w+\.\d{1\,2}@\d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2}) ,@&selectedmodreqdate,1);<BR />        MATCH(%CHATCLEAN%,^Filed by \w+ at \w+\.\d{1\,2}@\d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2} at (\w+\, .+),@&selectedmodreqlocation,1);<BR />        SET(@querymodreqtextline);<BR />        FILTER();<BR />    ENDIF;<BR />    IFMATCHES(%CHATCLEAN%,^  \[#\d{1} - \w+\] );<BR />        MATCH(%CHATCLEAN%,^  \[#\d{1} - \w+\] (.+),&selectedmodreqnotematch,1);<BR />        @&selectedmodreqnote[] = %&selectedmodreqnotematch%;<BR />        ARRAYSIZE(@&selectedmodreqnote[],#selectedmodreqarraysize);<BR />        DEC(#selectedmodreqarraysize);<BR />        SETPROPERTY(SelectedModReqLblNote%#selectedmodreqarraysize%,visible,1);<BR />        FILTER();<BR />    ENDIF;<BR />    IFMATCHES(%CHATCLEAN%,^Mod Request \d{1\,4} - );<BR />        FILTER();<BR />    ENDIF;<BR />ENDIF;<BR />
